text:
The standard-examples.war web.xml does not have any welcome files defined 
although there is an index.html file at the root of the standard-examples.war 
web app.

Note that the component defined for this bug is "Unknown Taglib" since it does 
not specifically apply to any single tag library.
creator: rtaylor@newatlanta.com

text:
At worst, if sample declaration of the uri directive and the TLD's location is 
described in "web.xml",
I think that there is basically no problem when using or learning "standard-
examples" application.
creator: super-creek@jcom.home.ne.jp

text:
(It is okay to include reports related to the standard-examples application 
under "Standard Taglib," even when a bug does not affect the tag library 
itself.)

I have added a <welcome-file-list> element to the example application's 
deployment descriptor.  I've also modified standard-doc in a correspondent
fashion.
creator: bayern@essentially.net
